# Aufgabe

Kann man die Anzahl gerade verliehener Fahrräder eines entsprechenden Anbieters anhand der Temperatur vorhersagen?

In dieser Übung untersuchen wir diese Frage.

Sie können die Daten von der [Webseite der UCI](https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Bike+Sharing+Dataset#) herunterladen.

Wir beziehen uns auf den Datensatz `day`.

Berechnen Sie einen Entscheidungsbaum  mit der Anzahl der aktuell vermieteten Räder als AV und der aktuellen Temperatur als UV!

Tunen Sie den Cp-Parameter des Baumes.

Geben Sie den MSE an!

[Hinweise](https://datenwerk.netlify.app/Hinweise.html)





</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>

# Lösung


::: {.cell hash='bike02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_03ec8793a2a20e39eb896ae7314748dd'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidymodels)
library(tidyverse)
library(tictoc)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='bike02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_ff58b37638c87041abd363f171b10612'}

```{.r .cell-code}
d <- read.csv("/Users/sebastiansaueruser/datasets/Bike-Sharing-Dataset/day.csv")
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='bike02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_145637ade0d274af9df622413dce9b46'}

```{.r .cell-code}
glimpse(d)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

:::


## Data split


::: {.cell hash='bike02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_1732c1b1f8002a889564014ae35bc8e9'}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(42)
d_split <- initial_split(d, strata = cnt)

d_train <- training(d_split)
d_test <- testing(d_split)
```
:::




## Define recipe


::: {.cell hash='bike02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_a00673697056057fc698aa81003f4226'}

```{.r .cell-code}
rec1 <- 
  recipe(cnt ~ temp, data = d)
```
:::




## Define model



::: {.cell hash='bike02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_c8ff5aaea84e8b793b2f685626cb2f71'}

```{.r .cell-code}
m1 <-
  decision_tree(cost_complexity = tune(),
                mode = "regression")
```
:::




## Define Resamples


::: {.cell hash='bike02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_7078ee532ff8804ba63b645fe1687dc7'}

```{.r .cell-code}
rsmpl <- vfold_cv(d_train)
```
:::



## Workflow



::: {.cell hash='bike02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_f4e64ceed2300568aea9ec75ce8f0a1e'}

```{.r .cell-code}
wf1 <-
  workflow() %>% 
  add_model(m1) %>% 
  add_recipe(rec1) 
```
:::




## Fit


::: {.cell hash='bike02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-9_47a464e2dffb38c249031af282bab898'}

```{.r .cell-code}
tic()
fit1 <- tune_grid(
  object = wf1, 
  resamples = rsmpl)
toc()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
9.307 sec elapsed
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
fit1
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# Tuning results
# 10-fold cross-validation

```
:::
:::



## Bester Kandidat


::: {.cell hash='bike02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-10_e32a5f436bb36a65507d03e05ad8a50a'}

```{.r .cell-code}
show_best(fit1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: No value of `metric` was given; metric 'rmse' will be used.
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 5 × 7
  cost_complexity .metric .estimator  mean     n std_err .config              
            <dbl> <chr>   <chr>      <dbl> <int>   <dbl> <chr>                
1      0.0208     rmse    standard   1478.    10    34.7 Preprocessor1_Model09
2      0.00220    rmse    standard   1538.    10    36.4 Preprocessor1_Model01
3      0.000306   rmse    standard   1556.    10    40.3 Preprocessor1_Model07
4      0.00000175 rmse    standard   1558.    10    39.7 Preprocessor1_Model02
5      0.0000194  rmse    standard   1558.    10    39.7 Preprocessor1_Model03
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='bike02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-11_bb6d952f44c1c84b5837a012b8055f0b'}

```{.r .cell-code}
wf1_best <-
  wf1 %>% 
  finalize_workflow(parameters = select_best(fit1))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: No value of `metric` was given; metric 'rmse' will be used.
```
:::
:::



## Last Fit


::: {.cell hash='bike02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-12_70c170075d7c4bb87ad590bdb5d25ec5'}

```{.r .cell-code}
fit_testsample <- last_fit(wf1_best, d_split)
```
:::




## Model performance (metrics) in test set


::: {.cell hash='bike02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-13_71b4f872a1348f912cf72548b1f6d91f'}

```{.r .cell-code}
fit_testsample %>% collect_metrics()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 2 × 4
  .metric .estimator .estimate .config             
  <chr>   <chr>          <dbl> <chr>               
1 rmse    standard    1430.    Preprocessor1_Model1
2 rsq     standard       0.473 Preprocessor1_Model1
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='bike02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-14_cfb6ef5cbee3d5d8b9a99635842450ed'}

```{.r .cell-code}
MSE <- fit_testsample %>% collect_metrics() %>% pluck(3, 1)
MSE
```

```

```
:::
:::
